posts.post_content:
Posted By: Doug Koskela
For Sale: a number of SGC-graded T205 and T206 cards.  Prices below include shipping.  PayPal preferred.  Front and back scans available upon request--please feel free to email me at kosked@spu.edu


T205:

Davy Jones, Sweet Caporal, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Jack Knight, Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Frank LaPorte, Sweet Caporal, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Danny Murphy, Honest Long Cut, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Gabby Street, Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Doc White, Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***


T206:

Davy Jones, Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Christy Mathewson (Dark Cap), Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

John McAleese, Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Danny Murphy (Batting), Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Bob Rhoades (Right Arm Extended), Sweet Caporal, SGC 40: $35

Tubby Spencer, Piedmont, SGC 50: ***SOLD***

Gabby Street (Portrait), Sweet Caporal, SGC 40: ***SOLD***

Doc White (Portrait), Piedmont, SGC 40: ***SOLD***


Thanks!

Doug

Posted By: Jantz

Hi Doug,

 Can I get scans of all the T206s in the SGC 40 grade except Mathewson & Rhoades.

Thanks,

Jantz

Posted By: Doug Koskela
Jantz,

Scans sent.  Thanks,

Doug

Posted By: Doug Koskela
JB,

Scans sent.  Thanks,

Doug

Posted By: Lance
I'll buy the rest unseen at $425 delivered. LMK.

Posted By: Doug Koskela
Lance,

Reply sent.  Thank you,

Doug

Posted By: Robert Reiss
Doug,

I'll Take (John McAleese, Piedmont, SGC 40: $35) if still available. Email sent. LMK

Thanks,   Bob

Posted By: Doug Koskela
Bob,

Thanks!  Email sent,

Doug

Posted By: Phil
Thanks Doug.  The Tubby Spencer arrived yesterday.  Smooth transaction.  Thanks!

Phil

Posted By: Doug Koskela
Rob,

Email sent.  Thanks,

Doug
